string.text: Выдатна, мне заўсёды падабалася даведацца нешта пра таго, каго я заб'ю. Жадаеце назваць сваё добрае імя?
А зараз... Здаецца, хутка мы будзем разліваць кроў адзін аднаго. Жадаеце нешта сказаць перад тым як мы пачнём?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Дазвольце мне назвацца.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Дазволіце мне прэзентавацца.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Прыемна бачыць вас ізноў. Прайшло так шмат часу з апошняга спаткання.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Як бы моцна чалавек не падарваў давер да сябе, у яго заўсёды павінен быць яшчэ адзін шанец выправіцца. Таму, я выслухаю ўсё, што вы скажаце.
Я вас не ведаю... Калі вам ёсць што сказаць, кажыце хутчэй. Крумкачы галодныя, і я б хачу прымушаць іх чакаць.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Калі справа дойдзе да бітвы паміж намі, што ж... я не атрымаю ад гэтага ніякага задавальнення.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Я да вашых паслугаў.
Стаяць. Жадаеш назвацца або мы адразу пяройдзем да справы?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Мір вам... Прыемна вас бачыць.
Стаяць! У вас ёсць што сказаць, або я загадаю атакаваць?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Мой меч у вашым распараджэнні.
Стойце тут. Вы можаце расказаць мне пра сябе, ці паберагчы дыханне для таго, што будзе далей.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Трапіліся. Цяпер вы нікуды не сыдзеце.
Стой на месцы. Скажы мне імя, з кім я змагаюся?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Я ведаю вашыя хітрыкі, а вы ведаеце мае. Дык, ваюем альбо мірымся, да справы....
Божа... Віно тут на смак як мача. Верна... Так, хто вы?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Я да вашых паслугаў.
Я да вашых паслугаў, {STR_SALUTATION}.
Вы ведаеце, што я пра вас думаю. Лепей, каб гэта было важным.
Хто вы? Адказвайце хутка, пакуль я не аддаў загад атакаваць.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Я чакаю вашых загадаў.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Як заўсёды, да вашых паслугаў.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Я прапаную вам сваю адданасць.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Ну, ну. Мне вельмі цікава паслухаць, што вы скажаце.
Дакладна. А хто ж вы тады?
Калі можна, калі ласка... Стойце тут. Папрашу вас назваць сваё імя.
Так? А хто ж вы, тады?
А цяпер. Не падыходзьце бліжэй. Прабачце мяне, але нельга быць занадта асцярожным. Я жадаў бы спытаць вашае імя.
Так? Вам нешта патрэбна ад мяне? Хто вы?
Хто вы, і чаго вы жадаеце?
Так? Вам нешта патрэбна ад мяне? Хто вы?
Спыніцеся там. Так... Значыць, мы можам трохі пагандлявацца. Але паспрабуй зрабіць нешта вераломнае, і мае хлопцы вас прырэжуць.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Ну... Даўненька я вас не бачыў. Не тое каб я турбаваўся з-за гэтага.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Даўно не бачыліся. Былі занятыя, я мяркую.
Ну... Прабачце, што не магу пажадаць вам 'міру', стары сябар. Лёс робіць тое, чаго жадае.
Спыніся, сябра. Магчыма, ты хочаш назваць мне сваё імя, перш чым мы скрыжуем мячы.
Скажыце мне вашае імя. Прабачце мяне, калі я сустракаў вас раней і не памятаю яго, бо я бачыў шматлікіх ваяроў, якія прыйшлі на гэтую зямлю і раптоўна згінулі ў неглыбокіх магілах.
Што ж. Вось мы і прыйшлі. Зладзьце мне годныя пахаванні, калі я паду ад вашага мяча, і я зраблю тое ж самае для вас. Вам ёсць што сказаць?
Здаецца, вашыя грахі яшчэ не дагналі вас. Але яны дагоняць, паверце мне, дагоняць...
Вы хацелі мяне бачыць для чагосьці?
Стойце... Калі вы выканаеце ўмовы перамір'я, я буду слухаць.
Здаецца, вы трапіліся, і я рады, што менавіта я вас злавіў.
Ну. Здаецца, мы з вамі ваюем. Такі лёс. Ёсць што сказаць?
Ну... Калі толькі я не мыляюся ў ацэнках, то ў вас вельмі добрыя шанцы пабаляваць са сваімі продкамі да канца гэтага дня.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Ready to give me a good fight?
{STR_SALUTATION}... This is truly an honor. Let me introduce myself.
Please be brief. I am pressed for time.
Well, if it comes down to you and me, let's make it a fight that the bards will sing about, hey?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Such a pity we meet like this.
{STR_SALUTATION}... So... A serpent has come to hiss in my ear.
I don't know what we have to say to each other.
My lady...
What is it, stranger? Who're you?
Ah, the Heavens are kind. What kind of death do you want, dog?
{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
Halt right there. Now then... Tell me your name, before we cross swords.
{STR_SALUTATION}... I think your luck has run out.
Well. Here we are. I once thought friendship was sacred, but all sacred things are profaned in the end. Don't think I won't kill you if I need to.
Welcome, stranger, to my little kingdom here. Who might you be?
{STR_SALUTATION}... It's an honor to meet you.
{STR_SALUTATION}... It is my great honor to introduce myself to you.
I am very angry with you. Too much time has gone by since last you visited.
That's close enough. Who are you?
{STR_SALUTATION}. I'm yours to command.
{STR_SALUTATION}... I am a bit pressed for time right now. What is it?
Your pardon - I did not catch your name.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Such a delight to see you.
{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your command.
Halt. Who're you?
Halt... Before we fight, I would know your name.
Come no closer. Before we come to blows, I would ask you your name.
Do you have anything to say, before I give the order to attack?
I've waited a long time for this day. Have a good look around you, for soon your eyes will have little to see but the inside of a raven's belly.
I trust you have been keeping well, doing honor to your name and cutting bloody swathes through your enemies.
Right, you. Prepare to get what's coming to you.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Good to see you.
{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm yours to command.
Please be brief. I am pressed for time.
Aye? I don't think I know you. Peace to you, stranger.
Well, I'll not deny it. It'll be a real pleasure to watch you writhing and bleeding in the dust.
That's close enough, now. Who are you?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Awaiting your orders, as always.
Ah, good. Justice seems to have appointed me her executioner today. Are you partial to the sword, or the noose?
My lady... You are lovely as ever.
Eh. Wine here tastes like piss. Anyway, what do you want?
{STR_SALUTATION}... You are lovely as ever.
Tell me your name. I always prefer to know whom I slay.
You know I don't care for you. What's it you want to say?
Prepare to reap a villain's reward, villain!
Well now, stranger. Peace to you. What is your name?
{STR_SALUTATION}... My heart is glad to see you.
Forgive me for what may seem an abundance of caution, but please keep your distance. Just beyond sword-length is fine. So, who might you be?
What do you want, stranger? Who are you?
{STR_SALUTATION}... May I introduce myself...
{STR_SALUTATION}... I'd wish you peace and prosperity, but of course I don't want that.
Leave your sword in its scabbard for a moment longer, stranger. Who might you be?
{STR_SALUTATION}. I am at your service.
{STR_SALUTATION}... It's very good to see you.
{STR_SALUTATION}... I take no joy in fighting you, but believe me I will do it if I need to.
Such a pleasant surprise to see you. I hope my men can find some fetters of silver or gold, worthy of your rank, as it appears you may be gracing us with your presence tonight.
Yours is not a face I know. What is your name, stranger?
Stop there. Who are you? It is better we know each other's names, even if we fight.
{STR_SALUTATION}. It's been a while.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Such a delight to see you.
Em.... Greetings, my lady. I do not believe that we've met.
{STR_SALUTATION}... I won't pretend I like you, but I'll hear you out.
Do you have anything to say?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Try my patience, and you'll regret it.
Respect the terms of the parley, and I will do likewise. Now, who are you?
Your health, stranger! So who might you be?
Peace to you, stranger. What is your name?
Since you're not going anywhere, we might as well have a little chat. Perhaps you'd like to introduce yourself?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Your beauty is a balm to my troubles.
I've caught you. Don't try any tricks. Anything to say?
{STR_SALUTATION}...You'd best pray someone gives you a quick death in battle one of these days, because if you ever fall into my hands, you'll find I have a long memory, and do not forgive.
Say whatever you have to say. After that, you die.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Fate clearly loves to watch old friends fight... Still, don't think I won't do my duty.
{STR_SALUTATION}... Peace to you.
{STR_SALUTATION}. I'm yours to command. Allow me to inscribe your command in the pages of history in letters of blood. Or whatever else you may need...
I don't know you. I suppose you should tell me your name.
{STR_SALUTATION}... I don't want to have to fight you. But I will, friend, I will.
Peace to you, stranger, though if you come any closer I may stick a knife in your belly, as one cannot be too careful these days.
{STR_SALUTATION}! I am honored to meet you. Let me introduce myself.
Well, good day to you. So who might you be?
What a pleasant surprise! I believe I'm going to enjoy this. Do you have anything to say, before I give the order to attack?
{STR_SALUTATION}... I don't know what we have to say to each other.
{STR_SALUTATION}... It's very, very good to see you.
Ah... Fate smiles on me today. I can think of no sweeter music than your death-rattle.
{STR_SALUTATION}... You know, puffed-up bandits such as yourself always get what they deserve, in the end.
Don't know you. Want to tell me your name, before we fight?
{STR_SALUTATION}. It's good to see you.
Halt there. Who are you? I would know whom I slay.
Aye? Sorry, I don't think I know you.
{STR_SALUTATION}... You'd best pray to the Heavens for mercy, because I intend to show none to you.
{STR_SALUTATION}... You still live, I see. Pity.
So... Just so you know, this here is my turf. Now, who might you be?
{STR_SALUTATION}... My greetings to you.
{STR_SALUTATION}... If you die well today, I'll be sure your courage is remembered.
Come any closer, stranger, and I'll stick a knife in your belly. But if you stay where you are, we may have a pleasant enough chat.
Stop there, stranger. I bid you peace. At least until I find out who you are, anyway.
Well... And who do we have here? Would you care to tell me your good name?
{STR_SALUTATION}... Unless you have something worthwhile to say, go pour your poison into someone else's ear.
